attributes.action: Start a petition on reducing prison sentence for prisoners due to covid 19
attributes.additional_details: Not seen my son for over a year now and I’m not the only one effected sentences need to be reduced family’s braking down been over 12 months
attributes.background: I want the government to look at prison sentences and refuse them due to co vid 19 and family’s not being able to see there family members looked up 23 hours a day

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/567457
